Description: On I-64 at mile marker 257.7 in the City of Newport News, near J Clyde Morris Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The east right center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 2.0 miles.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On BUS US-460 in the County of Giles, in the vicinity of Rt. 9849E/W (Giles County), motorists can expect delays due to an incident. The west left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Other Traffic

Description: On I-66 at mile marker 57.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 290.8 in the City of Chesapeake, near Battlefield Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All east outside lanes are closed. The east outside entrance ramp is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
